description: Three-layer security package per Creation Capital term sheet. L1 = pure financial claims (holding), L2 = guarantees & insurance (subsidiary-level, pushed down to IIC), L3 = physical assets & revenue contracts (subsidiary-level)

layer_1.description: Pure financial assets — IC loan receivables pledged to IIC, equity pledged to Creation Capital

items.note: Senior + Mezz IC loans, including capitalized interest
Share pledge to Mezz lender — NWL R930k + LanRED R1m + TWX R50k = R1.98M = EUR99k
